rooms.description:
This is the white dungeon. You don't know why you end up being here since you've lost all your memory.
 
		There is an ladder going upwards and nothing else.
 You should drop the black blood here if you have it with you.

This is altar. You feel like you are going crazy for no reason. Who am I? Why am I here?
You should drop your knife here.
You have fallen into the limbo. There's no exit. Prepare to die here. Game over. Only the null can get you points.
You have climbing up to heaven, there's an altar in the south.

items.description: A droplet of black blood. Probably belongs to some devil.
